'''fanga''' is the [[Quenya]] word for "beard".
==Etymology==
[[PQ]] ''[[spangâ]]'', perhaps from even earlier *''spanagâ''; [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[SPÁNAG]].<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies]]</ref>
==Examples==
*''[[Andafangar]]'' "[[Longbeards]]"
==Cognates==
*[[Telerin]] ''[[spanga]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[fang]]''
==Other version==
Earlier names for "beard" were ''poa''.<ref name="GL">[[Gnomish Lexicon]]</ref> and ''vanga''<ref name="GL"/><ref>{{HM|LT2}}</ref>
{{references}}
